entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023
